title: HSDL | The nation’s premier collection of homeland security documents
description: The nation’s premier collection of documents related to homeland security policy, strategy, and organizational management.
text:
How Can I Use the HSDL?
[Search for Resources](https://www.hsdl.org/c/search/)
Search over 250,000 librarian-selected resources related to homeland security policy, strategy, and organizational management.
[Set New Content Alerts](https://www.hsdl.org/c/subscriptions/)
Save your search criteria and we will automatically email you a list of any matching resources added in the last week.
[Ask a Librarian](https://www.hsdl.org/c/ask-a-librarian/)
The HSDL librarians are homeland security experts. Ask for their guidance on brief, factual, mission-related inquiries.
[DHS Releases Homeland Threat Assessment](https://www.hsdl.org/c/dhs-releases-homeland-threat-assessment/)
[In Case You Missed It: MMWR](https://www.hsdl.org/c/in-case-you-missed-it-mmwr-14/)
[In Search of Answers: NASA’s UAP Exploration](https://www.hsdl.org/c/in-search-of-answers-nasas-uap-exploration/)
[CISA Releases Its Open Source Software Security Roadmap](https://www.hsdl.org/c/cisa-releases-its-open-source-software-security-roadmap/)
[Maui Wildfires](https://www.hsdl.org/c/tl/maui-wildfires/)
August 8, 2023 Dry conditions and high winds from the unseasonably hot weather fueled the August 8, 2023 wildfires on the Hawaiian islands of Maui and Hawaii. This devastating event left extensive property damage, loss of life, and at least 1000 missing persons in the initial days of the fires...
[More about the event](https://www.hsdl.org/c/tl/maui-wildfires/) [End of COVID-19 PHE Declaration](https://www.hsdl.org/c/tl/covid-19-phe-end/)
May 11, 2023: On March 13, 2020, the U.S. federal government declared COVID-19 a national emergency. This declaration enabled several policy changes including mandated COVID-19 data collection, establishing various public assistance programs, and enacting Title 42. Public law 118-3, approved on April 10, 2023, terminated the national emergency declaration (GPO)...
[More about the event](https://www.hsdl.org/c/tl/covid-19-phe-end/) [Monterey Park Shooting](https://www.hsdl.org/c/tl/monterey-park-shooting/)
Date: January 21, 2023 At approximately 10:22 p.m. PST, police were dispatched to a mass shooting that occurred outside of Star Ballroom Dance Studio in Monterey Park, CA, a city east of Los Angeles. The shooting took place as the city’s predominantly Asian American community was celebrating the Lunar New..
[More about the event](https://www.hsdl.org/c/tl/monterey-park-shooting/) [2023 Tornado Season](https://www.hsdl.org/c/tl/23-tornado-season/)
January 12, 2023- According to NOAA’s Storm Prediction Center, preliminary data shows that 517 tornadoes have occurred in the United States through April 2023. Tornadoes with ratings from EFU (Enhanced Fujita Scale Unknown) to EF-4 have affected 20 states, including the rare touchdown of an EF-1 tornado in a city..
[More about the event](https://www.hsdl.org/c/tl/23-tornado-season/)
